content.rendered:
This is General purpose 9V Original HW marked Non-Rechargeable Battery for all your project and application needs. As we experienced the use of this battery in our testing lab for various purpose, we can assure you the best quality, long life and genuineness of this battery among all options available in the market at this cost.

Its Universal 9V battery size and connecting points; it is useful in many DIY projects as well as household applications and they can easily be replaced and installed

excerpt.rendered:
Constant 9V Output till lasts

Metal Jacket Body

Good Built Quality and hence Leakproof

Easy to install and Replace

Corrosion free Connector Point for long-term use

0% Mercury and Cadmium. Environment-friendly

OEM Compatible.
